title: Critics: 'G.I. Bill' out of date
description: A group of concerned veterans met to discuss Sen. Jim Webb's 21st Century G.I. Bill at Goodwin Park, mirroring a rally that took place in Washington on Tuesday.

title: Show Your Support for our Troops July 8
Parade Welcomes Returning War Veterans
description: Veterans of the nation's most recent wars received a warm welcome home when the "Welcome Home" End of Iraq War Parade marched through the downtown Sunday.

title: As conflict continues overseas, vets adjust to life at home
description: Portsmouth resident Josh Denton talks about the challenges for veterans coming home and his time he spent in Baghdad during the Iraq civil war.
